title: I cant go into a game and i dont know if i will get a ban or not?
body:
So on the 14/11/2017 (the day I'm writing this) I went into a draft pick and went through baning phase and then it came to playing the game and my computer couldn't run the game and I will be surpised if I get banned!! I don't know if this is a bug or not because I don't want to get banned for no reason when my client has a bug to make me get banned so please!!!!! I got a photo about it and if you want to see more prove add me and discord #4027. 

Thank you

replies.body:
You will not get banned for AFKing one game. Stuff happens.

Try starting a custom game-- there's definitely no AFK penalty there. See if the game runs there when you're checking to see if any changes you made are working.

That sounds very frustrating to me too; hate it when that happens. For starters, when the game stopped working, did you get any error messages at all? Common ones we see when things like this happen are 'LoL is not Responding' or getting bugsplat errors. The first one indicates connection issues, and can be troubleshot with these steps [**over here**](http://riot.com/12B7oac). You could also see that connection could be interrupted if the load wheel in Loading Screen was frozen.

Bugsplats on the other hand can be caused by a lot of different things, but we have a similar guide for them [**over here**](http://riot.com/1Fa5J8l).

If the guides don't help, or if you saw something completely different, just let me know!
